snippet: A 90-minute movie including interviews with band members and a live recording of a recent concert in Milan is to be shown on more than 3,000 screens on Oct. 11 and 12.
abstract: A 90-minute movie including interviews with band members and a live recording of a recent concert in Milan is to be shown on more than 3,000 screens on Oct. 11 and 12.

headline.main: Another One Direction Film Is on the Way
